-- | Usage: @'glTextureNormalEXT' mode@

-- The parameter @mode@ is a @TextureNormalModeEXT@


glTextureNormalEXT :: MonadIO m => GLenum -> m ()

glTextureNormalEXTFunPtr = unsafePerformIO (getProcAddress "glTextureNormalEXT")
